title: Scanners II: The New Order
occurrences: - I brought Feck and Gruner. - Scanners, are you sure?
My specialty is the study of scanners.
- Scanners... - That's what you are, Peter.
'We need an entire new order in our society, a coalition of political figures,
What's this about this new order of yours?
The only new order around here is when I investigate your so-called special unit.
Elaine, one of our female scanners, just died. We're losing too many too fast.
The only functional scanners we have left are Feck, Gruner and Drak.
It created scanners.
The other night I said this city needed a new order.
I will begin a new order.
Better than a splatter film. You know how his new order works?
They use scanners to control the society.
You don't believe me? Check out the scanners in Morse's basement.
It won't work, your new order.
My parents... were they scanners?
They were talking to other scanners, bringing them together.
They call us scanners.
Scanners?
Using scanners, Forrester can control anyone.
We're both scanners, Drak. Why help them?
The scanners.
Have you been using psychics called scanners?
There are no scanners. It's a myth.
The new order, the future!
